1.0.name: wordpress/jetpack-subscriptions-shortcode
1.0.description:
You do not need to use this plugin anymore! Jepack now includes its own subscription form shortcode: [jetpack_subscription_form]. You can read more about it here: Jetpack Support documentation: Subscriptions

Extends the Jetpack plugin and allows you to add a Subscription form anywhere inside your posts thanks to the [jpsub] shortcode

Important: for this plugin to work, you must activate Jetpack first, and activate the Subscriptions module.

This plugin is a work in progress. You can report issues here, or submit a pull request on GitHub.
